breadth.methodology: RSP/SPY relative performance as breadth proxy. RSP outperformance = more stocks participating.

meta.key_insight: Rotation-aware signals: regime-conditional roles, crash portfolio mode, cycle position modifiers. IEF restored.
features: F&G component breakdown
Fibonacci retracement/extension levels
Regime duration predictions
Outlier detection
Kalshi prediction markets (96.6% accuracy)
[v6] TLT sell filter (blocks 9.2% accuracy sell signals)
[v6] Kalshi signal integration (+10%/-30% confidence adjustment)
[v7] Fear threshold 30→25, Greed 85→80 (+22% buy accuracy)
[v7] Cluster limit: max 2 signals per sector per day
[v7] Sideways penalty: 1.5x confidence reduction
[v7] International priority: +4% entry improvement
[v7] Kalshi weight: 0.35 (boosted integration)
[v7] Bonds sell_enabled=False (full sell block)
[v8] Per-asset SMA periods (SPY:100, GLD:200, EFA:200, TLT:200, VNQ:100, XLE:100)
[v8] Divergence pair signals: SPY/XLF (87% revert), IYR/TLT (86.3% revert)
[v9] min_regime_days=3: Regime persists 3+ days before weights/penalties apply
[v9] XLF SMA 50→100: Removes false sideways penalty on financials
[v9] kalshi_weight 0.35→0.25: Calibrated to directional accuracy (~65-70%)
[v10] Market breadth: RSP/SPY relative performance as $BCMM proxy
[v10] Breadth divergence detection: SPY up but breadth narrowing = warning
[v10.1] Universe expanded: 9→25 primary ETFs across 9 asset classes
[v10.1] New sectors: XLC, XLB, XLU, XLP
[v10.1] New international: EEM, INDA, FXI, EWJ
[v10.1] New fixed income: IEF, HYG
[v10.1] New commodities: SLV, GDX, DBA, BITO
[v10.1] New thematic: QQQ, IWM
[v10.1] 5 new divergence pairs: GDX/GLD, XLU/TLT, HYG/TLT, IWM/SPY, EEM/SPY
[v10.1] Per-symbol signals (was per-asset-class)
[v10.2] Per-asset confidence multipliers (0.50x-1.30x from deep backtests)
[v10.2] Per-asset hold period overrides (backtested optimal per symbol)
[v10.2] Fear thresholds tightened: 18→12-15 (panic-only entries)
[v10.2] Greed F&G block at 70 (no BUY when greedy — ~20% WR)
[v10.2] Removed SLV (33% WR, -4.54 Sharpe) — IEF restored in V12
[v10.2] Star boosts: XLK/XLV (+25%), XLU/EFA/EEM/INDA (+30%)
[v10.2] Weak penalties: XLE (0.50x), FXI (0.60x), TLT (0.70x), GDX (0.70x)
[v10.2] Hold periods shortened for most assets (20d→5-10d based on backtest)
[v11] SELL SIGNALS DISABLED GLOBALLY — buy-only mode (+318% composite improvement)
[v11] Bear regime buy suppression — BUY blocked in confirmed bear (≥3d, safety filter)
[v12] ★ Sector Rotation Engine — 25yr cycle analysis
[v12] ★ Regime-conditional roles: 6 types (crisis hedge, defensive, all-weather, risk-on, cyclical, momentum)
[v12] ★ Roles loaded from regime-roles.json at runtime (DA #1)
[v12] ★ Multiplier cap [0.3, 1.5] prevents extreme confidence stacking (DA #2)
[v12] ★ Smooth cyclical phase boundaries via linear interpolation (DA #3)
[v12] ★ Crash portfolio mode: weighted scoring ≥60pts, 3-trigger system (DA #4)
[v12] ★ Everything-crash: GLD must be in BEAR, not just 'not bull' (DA #5)
[v12] ★ V-recovery early exit via XLV lead indicator (DA #6)
[v12] ★ Walk-forward test hooks for Phase 4 QA (DA #7)
[v12] ★ IEF restored — crisis_hedge role (+18.9% bear market gain, Sharpe 1.54)
[v12] ★ Rotation confidence modifier [0.75, 1.15]
[v12] ★ 12-step signal pipeline with debug logging
[v12] ★ Universe: 24 assets (IEF restored from V10.2 removal)
da_revisions_incorporated: #1: Load roles from regime-roles.json at runtime
#4: Crash trigger: weighted scoring ≥60 points (not OR logic)
#5: Everything-crash: GLD must be in BEAR
#7: Walk-forward validation prep (test hooks in rotation_analyzer.py)

pulse.summary: The market is in a mid-cycle bull run with fearful sentiment. Regime is sideways with no clear rotation leader.

actions.detail: Choppy markets — smaller bets until direction clears

warnings: Models diverge — F&G says fear while cycle says mid_bull
